32#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KCONDVAR_H_
33#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KCONDVAR_H_
34
35#include_next <sys/condvar.h>
36
37#ifdef _KERNEL
38
39typedef enum {
40 CV_DEFAULT,
41 CV_DRIVER
42} kcv_type_t;
43
44typedef enum {
45 TR_CLOCK_TICK,
46} time_res_t;
47
48#define cv_init(a, b, c, d) cv_init(a, "zfscv")
49
50static inline clock_t
51cv_timedwait_hires(kcondvar_t *cvp, kmutex_t *mp, hrtime_t tim, hrtime_t res,
52 int flag)
53{
54 extern int hz;
55 int ticks = ((uint64_t)tim * hz) / 1000000000;
56
57 return cv_timedwait(cvp, mp, ticks);
58}
59
60static inline clock_t
61cv_reltimedwait(kcondvar_t *cvp, kmutex_t *mp, clock_t delta, time_res_t res)
62{
63
64 cv_wait(cvp, mp);
65 return 0;
66}
67
68#else
69
70extern clock_t cv_timedwait_hires(kcondvar_t *, kmutex_t *, hrtime_t, hrtime_t,
71 int);
72
73#endif /* _KERNEL */
74
75#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_KCONDVAR_H_ */
76
